title: Top Places to visit in Uttar Dinajpur, Raiganj, West Bengal
content: Uttar Dinajpur is a district of the Indian state of West Bengal. Created on 1 April 1992 by the division of the erstwhile West Dinajpur district, it comprises two subdivisions: Raiganj and Islampur. title: Top Places to visit in South 24 Parganas, Alipore, West Bengal
content: South 24 Parganas or sometimes South Twenty Four Parganas is a district in the Indian State of West Bengal, headquartered in Alipore. It is the largest district of West Bengal state by area and second largest by population. It is the sixth most populous district in India (out of 640). On one side

title: Top Places to visit in Purulia, West Bengal
content:
Purulia district is one of the twenty three districts of West Bengal state in Eastern India. Purulia is the administrative headquarters of the district. Some of the other important towns of Purulia district are Raghunathpur-Adra, Jhalida and Balarampur.

title: Top Places to visit in Purba Medinipur, Tamluk, West Bengal
content: Purba Medinipur district is an administrative unit in the Indian state of West Bengal. It is the southernmost district of Medinipur division – one of the five administrative divisions of West Bengal. The headquarters in Tamluk. title: Top Places to visit in Paschim Medinipur, Midnapore, West Bengal
content: Paschim Medinipur district (পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর জেলা) or West Midnapore district (also known as Midnapore West) is one of the districts of the state of West Bengal, India. title: Top Places to visit in North 24 Parganas, Barasat, West Bengal
content: North 24 Parganas or sometimes North Twenty Four Parganas is a district in southern West Bengal, of eastern India. North 24 Parganas extends in the tropical zone from latitude 22º11'6" north to 23º15'2" north and from longitude 88º20' east to 89º5' east. It is bordered to Nadi

title: Top Places to visit in Nadia, Krishnanagar, West Bengal
content:
Nadia district is a district in the state of West Bengal, in eastern India. It borders Bangladesh to the east, North 24 Parganas and Hooghly districts to the south, Purba Bardhaman to the west, and Murshidabad to the north.

title: Top Places to visit in Murshidabad, Baharampur, West Bengal
content: Murshidabad district is a district of in the Indian state of West Bengal. Situated on the left bank of the river Ganges, the district is very fertile. title: Top Places to visit in Maldah, English Bazar, West Bengal
content: Malda district, also spelt Maldah or Maldaha is a district in West Bengal, India. It lies 347 km (215 miles) north of Kolkata, the capital of West Bengal. title: Top Places to visit in Kolkata, West Bengal
content: Kolkata, also known as Calcutta the official name until 2001) is the capital of the Indian state of West Bengal. title: Top Places to visit in Kalimpong, West Bengal
content: Kalimpong district is a district in the state of West Bengal, India. It was formed on 14 February 2017, after splitting from the Darjeeling district as the 21st district of West Bengal. title: Top Places to visit in Jhargram, West Bengal
content: Jhargram district is a district in the state of West Bengal, India. It is known for its "wooded beauty" and hill ranges of Belpahari, Kankrajhor to the north and Subarnarekha to the south. It is a destination for tourists who visit its forests, ancient temples, royal palaces, and folk music sites
